title: Performance of my phone is not working good it hangs too much
content:
I have issue with device performance it hangs too many times.
Incoming calls ringed first then after few second it shows on screen .it doesn't show as quickly as it rings.
Person on another sideof call can not hear my voice quite oftenly 
Whenever I open my you tube Orr another app in which horizontal. Performance should done back space bar line which is present on screen at down it do not change its space it remains there so I have to face problem in back.
